title: libxau doesn't find xproto even if spack finds it
body:
### Expected Result

Successful install

### Actual Result

libxau can't find xproto installed by spack

```
[sajid@xrmlite spack]$ spack install libxau  %intel@18.0.3
==> pkgconf is already installed in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/pkgconf-1.4.2-qpzehzoxsht2egj2qaenif3l4tue7koa
==> util-macros is already installed in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/util-macros-1.19.1-mcpc6iksxiwi524dnk62ir3v4iobcqiu
==> xproto is already installed in /home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/xproto-7.0.31-6hcwzhe5do4c3mg7wg4kub4laf2un6mj
==> Installing libxau
==> Using cached archive: /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/cache/libxau/libxau-1.0.8.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/libxau-1.0.8-p5ow55z3f3ckzsppuoshkfdqfebcawlm/libXau-1.0.8.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/libxau-1.0.8-p5ow55z3f3ckzsppuoshkfdqfebcawlm
==> No patches needed for libxau
==> Building libxau [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/libxau-1.0.8-p5ow55z3f3ckzsppuoshkfdqfebcawlm/libXau-1.0.8/configure' '--prefix=/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-18.0.3/libxau-1.0.8-p5ow55z3f3ckzsppuoshkfdqfebcawlm'

1 error found in build log:
     124    Perhaps you should add the directory containing `xorg-macros.pc'
     125    to the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable
     126    Package 'xorg-macros', required by 'virtual:world', not found
     127    checking whether make supports nested variables... (cached) yes
     128    checking whether ln -s works... yes
     129    checking for pathconf... yes
  >> 130    checking for XAU... configure: error: Package requirements (xproto) were not met:
     131
     132    Package 'xproto', required by 'virtual:world', not found
     133
     134    Consider adjusting the PKG_CONFIG_PATH environment variable if you
     135    installed software in a non-standard prefix.
     136

See build log for details:
  /home/sajid/packages/spack/var/spack/stage/libxau-1.0.8-p5ow55z3f3ckzsppuoshkfdqfebcawlm/libXau-1.0.8/spack-build.out
```
The pacakge.py for libxau does have xproto though : 
```
    depends_on('xproto', type=('build', 'link'))
    depends_on('pkgconfig', type='build')
    depends_on('util-macros', type='build')
```

[spack-build.out](https://pastebin.com/x46EVMf3)

### Information on your system

 1. linux-centos7-x86_64, intel@18.0.3
